title: Elise is Bugged
body: Just a couple minor bugs with Elise. Her audio is glitchy, I can only hear the transformation from human to spider and not vice-versa. Q in spider form had no audio, and I was also able to auto-attack in human form and switch to spider form mid auto-attack and perform the aa animation in spider and kill the cs at human form range.

replies.body:
Hey 75g for a Pink (nice name, btw!) - 

We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix. Thanks for the report! ^-^
